channel.title: Candy – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: Neutron
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: Nougat and white chocolate and almond, oh my.
item.content:encoded: White chocolate and toasted almond play off each other perfectly on the inhale, while the creamy nougat carries a delicate sweetness on the exhale.

item.title: Hydrogen
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A cold, crisp blend of mints and menthol.
item.content:encoded: An invigorating blend of mints and menthol designed to tickle the lungs of chill seekers. It is customary to give this blend the cold shoulder.

item.title: Node
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A sweet and tangy cherry candy.
item.content:encoded: Cherry lovers, look no further: Node is the answer to your heart’s desire. This sweet mixture features no less than four distinct types of cherry, with an ever so subtle note of raspberry for added depth. On the inhale, the cherry medley is more than happy to make its home in your mouth. As you begin to exhale, the raspberry softens up the sweetness, while preserving the unique integrity of the blend.

item.title: Ion
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded: This hard candy recipe is crafted with a generous measure of blue-raspberry and raspberry that’s sure to satisfy even the most demanding sweet tooth. Fruit-candy lovers take heed: One bottle may not be enough.

item.title: Spectrum
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of fruit candies that will have you tasting the rainbow.
item.content:encoded: Spectrum is our rendition of the famous candy that rhymes with “skiddles”. Strawberry, lemon, lime, orange, and grape are fused together to form a familiar, flavorful collaboration. This distinctive blend is capable of fulfilling your recommended daily allowance of fruit in a single toot.

item.title: Parallax
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of sweet peach candy paired with creamy vanilla undertones.
item.content:encoded: Parallax exhibits sweet peach candy and marries it nicely with smooth vanilla cream. This highly sought after flavor profile firmly accentuates sweet peach and vanilla tones, both on the inhale and the exhale.

item.title: Ellipsis
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: An artful waterfall of orange candy.
item.content:encoded: This simple yet exuberant recipe showcases waterfalls of orange that flood the palate with joy. This orange blend is one you’ll be reluctant to share.

item.title: Graviton
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: An exhilirating lemonade defined by that red fish candy.
item.content:encoded: This prestigous recipe starts with a bold and zesty raspberry pink lemonade. Using three seperate lemon profiles, we’re convinced this may very well be the best darn lemon recipe in the business. We then throw in a dash of Swedish Fish for that sweet and smooth raspberry flavor that brings out the kid in all of us.

item.title: Fusion
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A sweet blueberry candy with subtle suggestions of citrus.
item.content:encoded: Plump, juicy blueberries infused with the sweet, mild tang of citrus makes Fusion a sweet tooth favorite. On the inhale you will experience the satisfyingly sweet blueberry candy. On the exhale is when the citrus joins the party to round things out.

item.title: Hybrid
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of ripe peaches and strawberry candy with strong berry notes.
item.content:encoded: Supple, juicy peach blends together with sweet, ripe strawberries to make the perfect fruit candies. To start, we chose tangy white-peach candy for a bold and attention-grabbing inhale. For the finish, we went with a sweet strawberry exhale that will take your breath away.
